segments.text: I see the jars filled with cookies, a temptation for the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's determination as he climbs is both impressive and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of nostalgia; I remember similar moments from my childhood.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But nostalgia doesn't handle the potential for chaos well.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman still doesn't notice, wrapped up in her own world of dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she ever looks up to see what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That quiet garden outside feels so far removed from the tension inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
